rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Coalesce {5}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this for {5}{G}{G} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
